com.versant.event
Class QueryChannelBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.event.ChannelBuilder
      com.versant.event.QueryChannelBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class QueryChannelBuilder
extends ChannelBuilder

Used to specify the properties of a query-based channel. A query-based channel can generate events for the creation, modification and deletion of instances of a class that satisfy a query predicate.

The QueryChannelBuilder automatically adds the event types INSTANCE_DELETED, INSTANCE_MODIFIED, and INSTANCE_CREATED to the channel. If desired, these types can be removed from the channel using the removeEventType() or removeEventTypeRange() methods.

See Also:

Method Detail

addQueryString

public void addQueryString(java.lang.String query)
Appends the VQL query to the previous queries associated with this channel. The query is appended as follows: previousQuery + ";" + query.

getQueryString

public java.lang.String getQueryString()
Returns the VQL string representing the condition evaluated when an event is raised.

setQueryString

public void setQueryString(java.lang.String query)
Sets the VQL query associated with this channel. This method overrides any previous set queries.

getProperties

public java.util.Properties getProperties()
For an instance of this class the key/value pairs returned are 1. events(key)/Events defined for this channel (value). channel. 2. vquery(key)/VQL query assosciated with this channel.
